data.name: Bob
data.text: Forest of shadows在某种意义上还真不'老'(滑稽), 不过我觉得相比于那些old-shcool的doom, 它更有一种厄运感

post.text:
#55144
Awakened this dying season
such a beauty to behold
Autumn hath arrived
a tragedy painted red
— Wish
     by Forest of Shadows
老厄运了，开嗓红心
心情不好的时候听厄运就会有种somebody empathize with you的感觉
